David Hazelwood

Associate Director

David became Associate Director for John F Hunt Power in January 2022.
Having joined the company as a Yard Assistant in 2013, he has worked in several roles across the business including Hire Controller, Business Development Manager and Regional Sales Manager.

In his current role as part of the leadership team, David plays a key role in operations, marketing, and sales, whilst maintaining account management responsibilities for a portfolio of key accounts.

His experience of working in roles across all levels of the business is a key asset to the management team.

Prior to working for John F Hunt, David studied for a bachelors degree in Media & Communication at Nottingham Trent University, gaining a skill base which has helped the business grow its online presence in recent years.
